ShadowSiren:BluntDamage.NAME: Blunt
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deals #b50% more damage to targets with #yBlock.

ShadowSiren:ElectricDamage.NAME: Electric
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Arcs to a random enemy on hit, dealing #b50% less damage each arc.

ShadowSiren:FireDamage.NAME: Fire
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Target loses HP equal to unblocked damage dealt. Deals up to #b25% more attack damage to targets with full HP. NL #yBlock: When you are attacked, deals 3 [FireIcon] damage.

ShadowSiren:IceDamage.NAME: Ice
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Applies #yChill equal to damage dealt. Creatures deal #b1% less damage per #yChill stack they have. NL #yBlock: When you are attacked, applies #yChill equal to damage taken.

ShadowSiren:ShadowDamage.NAME: Shadow
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Ignores #yBlock and applies #yShadow #ySplit instead of dealing damage. Targets take up to double damage when #yShadow #ySplit exceeds their current HP.

ShadowSiren:IceBlock.NAME: Ice Shield [IceIcon]
ShadowSiren:IceBlock.DESCRIPTION: When you are attacked, applies #yChill equal to damage taken.

ShadowSiren:FireBlock.NAME: Fire Shield [FireIcon]
ShadowSiren:FireBlock.DESCRIPTION: When you are attacked, deals #b3 [FireIcon] damage to the attacker.
